name: Overexposed
description:
Airport baggage scaner simulator.

You have to scan baggage and move to bin "bad" items. Enjoy ;)

Controls:
WSAD - movement
RMB - grab item
Mouse scroll - move current item closer further

Game was made on 36h game jam - Warsaw Film School Gam Jam

Credits:
Grzegorz Śnieciński - Design, Gameplay, Level Design
Mateusz Głuszek - 3D Art
Dawid W. Mika - Music & Sound Design
